properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NICKNAME, ENROLL_DATE, MODIFY_DATE, STATUS FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND (STATUS = 'U' OR STATUS = 'A')
INSERT INTO MEMBER(MEM_NO, MEM_ID, MEM_PWD, NICKNAME) VALUES(SEQ_MEM.NEXTVAL,?,?,?)
UPDATE MEMBER SET NICKNAME =?, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_ID =? AND (STATUS = 'U' OR STATUS = 'A')
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEM_PWD =? , MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE MEM_NO =? AND MEM_PWD =? AND (STATUS = 'U' OR STATUS = 'A')
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS ='N' WHERE MEM_PWD =? AND MEM_NO =? AND (STATUS = 'U' OR STATUS = 'A')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_ID = ?
SELECT MEM_NO,NICKNAME FROM MEMBER WHERE STATUS = 'U'
